author: Express & Star
title: Ground News - Max Kilman dedicates Wolves goal to Mario Lemina and family following father's passing
text:
Summary by Express & Star Captain Max Kiman celebrated opening the scoring for Wolves against Everton by holding up Mario Lemina's number 5 shirt in support of his team-mate and family. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
